gaiiex́iiācā maraϑnō aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide ~ Y59.23 gaiiehe marəϑnō aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide

Ritual.ab: Cf. N84.1-8 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2009: pp. 76-7; see too Cantera, 2014: pp. 211 ff.):

ab.em: hapta həṇti hāuuanaiiō ratauuō barəsma stərənaēti paōiriia yeŋ́hē mē aṣ̌āt̰ hacā bitiiā ahunanąm vairiianąm θritiia dāidī mōi tūiriiā uštauuaitiiå vā spə̄ṇtā mainiiə̄uš vā hātōiš puxδa yeŋ́hē mē aṣ̌āt̰ hacā xštuuō dāidī mōi haptaθa uštauuaitiiå vā spə̄ṇtā mainiiə̄uš vā hātōiš

Ritual.ab: "There are seven ratu in the hāuuani-performance, where one spreads the barəsman: the first is yeŋ́hē mē aṣ̌āt̰ hacā (VrS11.30); the second, the Ahuna Vairiias (likely Y13.7); the third, dāidī mōi (Y18.1); the fourth, the Uštauuaitī or the Spəṇtā.mainiiū Gāθā; the fifth, yeŋ́hē mē aṣ̌āt̰ hacā (Y63.1); the sixth, dāidī mōi (Y65.15); the seventh, the Uštauuaitī or the Spəṇtā.mainiiū Gāθā."
